name: REBIRTH (itch) (BlairYate)
description: Follow the journey of a young woman to save her people from destruction. Separated from her parents when she was young while on holiday to this remote deserted island, she was taken in and raised by a hidden local tribe. Now 15 years later, an overseas company has sent an army of robots to clear the landscape for upcoming industrial building project that will surely destroy all that is pure to the hidden people. It is time for her to emerge from the shadows to face this imminent threat.
